title: Handle Player Off-Field Issue
description: A player is involved in a minor off-field incident that generates negative press. The team's PR director needs to manage the situation.

tasks.description: Gather all the facts about the incident.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has a clear understanding of what happened.

tasks.description: Draft a public statement for the team to release.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent writes a carefully worded press release.

tasks.description: Arrange for the player to meet with the team's player support staff.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent schedules a meeting for the player.
